price: Kuma ku ji tsõron wani yini wanda ake mayar da ku a cikinsa zuwa ga Allah, sa'an nan kuma a cika wa kõwane rai abin da ya sanã'anta, kuma sũ bã a zãluntar su.
arabic: وَٱتَّقُواْ يَوۡمٗا تُرۡجَعُونَ فِيهِ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ ثُمَّ تُوَفَّىٰ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّا كَسَبَتۡ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-ittaqū yawman tur'jaʿūna fīhi ilā al-lahi thumma tuwaffā kullu nafsin mā kasabat wahum lā yuẓ'lamūna
